name: Can Toss Fun - Hit & Smash 3D
description:
It is a simple but highly addictive game set in a holiday like place.
The target of the game consists in knocking down the cans with as less throws as possible. Simply aim at the pile of cans and throw them down with the provided fruit. Strike down the exploding cans to destroy the entire pile with one hit.
The green can provides you with one additional ball (fruit).
Use as less throws as you can to establish a new record.
Improve your skills with every match and check how many stages you manage to complete.

Play instructions: Aim at the can, calibrate the strength you want to put in your shot and shoot by sliding briefly on the screen or flick the ball.

Features:
• Colorful 3D graphics
• Different balls: Coconut, Mango and Pineapple
• Challenging levels in an amazing beach environment
• The challenge becomes more difficult with each achievement
• Challenging and realistic physics game play
• Special cans: The red dynamite can, the green multiplier can

Show off your skills and challenge your friends!

This is an amazing time killer placed in a wonderful beach environment designed to entertain you.

If you like the game please rate it with 5 stars on the app store.
